subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With a string of harsh sanctions that has included the likely forfeiture of a first-round draft pick for the Patriots, Commissioner Roger Goodell has lowered the boom on N.F.L. rules-breakers.
snippet: With a string of harsh sanctions that has included the likely forfeiture of a first-round draft pick for the Patriots, Commissioner Roger Goodell has lowered the boom on N.F.L. rules-breakers.
